name: Àrengard - Invasion
description:
Goblins are nasty, greedy creatures and do everything to get their beloved gold. So combine forces with up to 7 friends and survive the Goblins siege to keep your gold.

Select one out of four classes and prepare your castle for the Goblins siege

Features:
- Classes (Archer, Soldier, Mage, Defender)
- Fighting
- Control siegeengines
- PVE / CO-OP
- Different enemy classes (Bomber, Soldier, Siegeengines)
- Cosmetics
